ability.Lunar Aura: On switch-in, this Pokemon sets Lunar Aura on its side for 3 turns. Under Lunar aura, Lunar moves's has their secondary effect chance of 100%.

Lunar Slash.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Lunar Flight.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.

Zen Headbutt.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
